Author: Hattu
Name: SAMMI Webhook Plugin
Punchline: OBS automation based on game events via SAMMI webhooks
Description:
Sends game data SAMMI via webhook, allowing users to automate OBS actions such as playing effects, transitions, sounds, etc. based on in-game events.
Requires SAMMI and OBS to function. See https://sammi.solutions or the plugin's readme on GitHub.
/psammi to configure.
